user_query: My company is organizing a corporate event and we are considering horse racing as an activity. Can you provide me with the win rate statistics for jockeys and trainers in the last 7 days? Additionally, I need the match list for an upcoming ice hockey tournament to entertain our guests.

TaskList.description: Retrieve win rate statistics for jockeys and trainers from horse racing events in the last 7 days.
Get the match list for the upcoming ice hockey tournament.
